title: chest available for hero and account, S- achieved by ally, but none received
body:
I assume this does not belong in the "Report a bug"  section.

I played my first game as Nasus, and two of my teammates received an S or S- rank at the end of the game.  I received a key fragment, but no chest.

According to my profile, I have three chests available.  Nasus has not received a chest this season (this is my very first game with him).  I have before received a chest on my very first game as Sona when a teammate ranked at S, so I believe I should have received one.

It may have to do with the fact that as Nasus, I have received no "season highest grade."

I have uploaded a photo showing that 1) I have 3 chests available, 2) I played as Nasus today, 6/8/2017, and 3) I did not receive a chest or "season highest grade" for the game.

I sadly see no way for me to look up the ranks of my fellow teammates, only my meager rank "B".  If anyone knows of a way to look up the rankings of all the players in a game, please let me know.  I did not think to take a photo before I left the endgame results page.

Thank you.  I know this may not be seen, or easy to resolve, so I understand if you skip this.  I just thought I'd try.

See you out on the rift. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
I may have figured out, after reading through the riot webpage again.

It says "When you or someone in your premade party earns any S rank, you’ll acquire a chest."  Should I assume that means that the only teammates who can help me gain chests are teammates I invited before I entered into the game queue?

Basically, if I go in like this photo, only I can help me earn a chest.  Is this true?  

Hopefully the photo attaches through the link.  XD

[photo of my queue](http://imgur.com/VtxhPM2)

If so, I apologize for the misunderstanding.  And thank you for your time.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Yaas!  The teammate that received an S has to be part of you're **premade**.  I know there's quite a few requirements, but let me know if that helps!

It does.  But it also makes it a lot harder.  :(  Oh well, I'll get there.

Thank you.

You're not alone!  Hit up the [GD boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/mNBeEEkI) and make a game with the community!  They're good (slightly peculiar) folks, with a Discord channel as well!  

If you want something a bit more serious, though, you can also check out the [team recruitment ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment)boards.  Get out there frand!

> [{quoted}](name=KJGrenadier,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yJyVOixV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-08T18:15:55.517+0000)
>
> I may have figured out, after reading through the riot webpage again.
> 
> It says "When you or someone in your premade party earns any S rank, you’ll acquire a chest."  Should I assume that means that the only teammates who can help me gain chests are teammates I invited before I entered into the game queue?
> 
> Basically, if I go in like this photo, only I can help me earn a chest.  Is this true?  
> 
> Hopefully the photo attaches through the link.  XD
> 
> [photo of my queue](http://imgur.com/VtxhPM2)
> 
> If so, I apologize for the misunderstanding.  And thank you for your time.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

you can get up to one chest per champ and you have to own the champ. also- only **party** members s grade would count for you

I own the champion.  I guess I should have mentioned that too.  

I will keep the party member requirement in mind.

Thanks.
